sentences.en: ...cream-coloured trousers with sharp creases.
sentences.cn: …裤缝笔挺的乳白色裤子。

sentences.en: Be careful not to crease up the page!
sentences.cn: 小心别把这些书页弄皱了!

sentences.en: Cotton, hemp and blending clothes: reducing fold and crease, easily pressed.
sentences.cn: 棉 、 麻质及混纺衣物: 减少皱褶, 易于熨平.

sentences.en: Discusses dyeing behaviours of silk fabrics anti - crease finish under different conditions.
sentences.cn: 讨论了真丝织物经不同条件整理后的染色性能.

sentences.en: Does artificial silk crease more easily than natural silk?
sentences.cn: 人造丝比天然丝更易起皱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't sit for too long or you'll crease your new dress.
sentences.cn: 别坐得太久,否则会弄皱你的新衣服.

sentences.en: Haynes was still at the crease, unbeaten on 84.
sentences.cn: 海恩斯还在击球线上，他已经得了84分了。

sentences.en: His face crease in a knowing smile.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上露出狡黠的笑容.

sentences.en: I do make him laugh. Don't ask me why, but I'll be saying something and he'll just crease up.
sentences.cn: 我确实能让他笑。别问我为什么，不过我将要说的事肯定会让他大笑不止。

sentences.en: I’ll have to iron out the creases.
sentences.cn: 我得把皱褶熨平。

sentences.en: In severe creasing the frictional resistance plays only a minor role in determining the crease resistance.
sentences.cn: 在严重的折皱作用下,摩擦阻力在织物抗折皱能力中仅居次要地位.

sentences.en: Jo could imitate anybody and always made him crease up.
sentences.cn: 乔能模仿任何人并总能逗得他大笑。

sentences.en: Liz sat down on the bed, lowering herself carefully so as not to crease her skirt.
sentences.cn: 莉兹小心翼翼地坐在床上，生怕把裙子弄皱。

sentences.en: Most outfits crease a bit when you are travelling.
sentences.cn: 旅行时大多数服装都会略微起褶。

sentences.en: On alert the ear should never droop, bend, or crease.
sentences.cn: 警惕时,耳朵决不下垂 、 弯曲 、 或折叠.

sentences.en: Pack the clothes carefully so that you don't crease them.
sentences.cn: 把衣服细心装好,免得弄皱了.

sentences.en: Please don't crease the blouse when you pack it.
sentences.cn: 包装时请不要将衬衫弄皱了.

sentences.en: She smoothed the creases from her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她捋平裙子上的皱褶。

sentences.en: She stood up, frowning at the creases in her silk dress.
sentences.cn: 她站起来，看着丝裙上的折痕皱起了眉。

sentences.en: You've got a crease in your dress where you've been sitting.
sentences.cn: 你把衣服坐出了一条皱痕.

trans.tran_cn: 皱褶，折缝，折痕，（皮肤上，尤指脸上的）皱纹，板球运动（投球手和击球手的）位置线
trans.tran_en: Creases are lines that are made in cloth or paper when it is crushed or folded
to become marked with a line or lines, or to make a line appear on cloth, paper etc by folding or crushing it

trans.tran_cn: 使有皱褶，弄皱，表面被子弹擦伤或击伤
